reviewText: Good value.  The case it comes in is a bit impractical for most movie shelves though, so consider switching the dvds into cases of their own

For four decades, New Line Cinema has brought audiences some of the most memorable movies in film history. From Academy Award-winning masterpieces to horror classics to groundbreaking comedies and more, there is something for everyone in the New Line vaults. This one-of-a-kind set includes: 17 hit movies on DVD, an exclusive documentary on the history of New Line Cinema, and a hardbound collector's book packaging.

Movies included: Pink Flamingos, A Nightmare on Elm Street, The Player, The Mask, Seven, Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery, Boogie Nights, Wag the Dog, The Wedding Singer, Rush Hour, Blow, The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, Elf, The Notebook, and Wedding Crashers.
